name: Nothing (cdsid10)
description:
Controls - 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move ( Haven't tested joysticks but they should work too)

Move and avoid the obstacles in the way and burn the timer to gradually become smaller and smaller, when you turn into nothing you win, otherwise you become something and you lose.

When you become a bit larger you still have another chance to get back in the game, find out the "yellow something" and pick it up.

Have added a kind of cheat which makes it easier to win, find out if you can. :)

A pretty casual game I developed for the jam, I joined pretty late and only had like 12 hours to make the whole game. 

Feedback is appreciated, Not playtested it much so expect a few bugs or a lot of them!
